mapper.select: select * from SOMOIM_BOARD_COMMENTS where som_board_num=#{som_board_num} order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into somoim_board_comments (num, som_member_num, content, good_count, som_board_num) values (SEQ_SOMOIM_BOARD_COMMENTS.nextval, 1 , #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR },0,#{som_board_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from SOMOIM_BOARD_COMMENTS where num = #{num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and som_board_num = #{som_board_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
